kpi.name: M1006C257

kpi_info.title: LFDPHONE PCH TO FACH OR DCH SUCCESS
kpi_info.use: The number of times when Legacy Fast Dormancy Phone has made PCH->FACH or PCH->DCH transition. Also other state transition counters for example M1006C171 are updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC receives positive RRC protocol ack message indicating successful PCH->FACH or PCH->DCH transition for LFDphone. Here "PCH" means either Cell_PCH or URA_PCH.

kpi.kpi_alias: LFDPHONE PCH TO FACH OR DCH SUCCESS
